# temperature

**Instance Property**

The water temperature.

## Declaration

```swift
var temperature: Measurement<UnitTemperature> { get }
```

## Accessing the data

- **date**: The time and date when the system recorded the measurements.
- **temperatureUncertainty**: The amount of uncertainty in the measurement of the water temperature.
